Animating is now simple and fun! Animate with your drawings, images, and videos. Get inspired by searching FlipaClip on Instagram and YouTube. Try it now!

-- v1.3.7 --
* Fixed bug where projects showed incorrect canvas size.
* Fixed crash seen when opening and closing in-app features screen.

-- v1.3.6 --
* New! drag & drop images from other apps into stage!
* Fixed text tool displaying invalid characters for emojis and other unsupported encodings.
* Fixed moving text transform anchor point caused text input popup to show.
* Fixed changes to the text transform selection size doesn't report new text size changes.
* Fixed changing text size or opacity generates multiple history events.
* Fixed memory retention caused by text tool.
* Now an audio clip with error will open the missing audio package to be downloaded or purchased.
* After audio package download now missing audio clips are reloaded automatically.
* Fixed can't redo after inserting text or image and hitting undo.
* Fixed built movies getting stretched when picking a different output size.
* Extensive internal changes for in-app purchases and audio library purchases and downloads.

It’s finally here! We are so excited about the brand new FlipaClip! We’ve refined the experience to focus more on your creativity and inspiration.

Here are the highlights.
- The app got a makeover! - We’ve polished the app extensively to optimize your creative experience and focus on your work. Words can’t really express the effort we made to make it the best of the best :)
- Dark Mode - Now you can personalize FlipaClip with a new Dark Mode or Light Mode with seven customizable accent colors.
- New Home - All your projects will now be beautifully laid out.
- Stacks - You can now organize your projects into stacks. Just drag a project over another to create a stack.
- Discover new possibilities - We are super excited to introduce this new section that will help you learn, get inspired, and be challenged! Keep an eye because we will add a lot of content in the next few months!
- Check out the newest video we added of TikTok influencer @tootymcnooty. We met her in Miami and did a fun video shoot. Watch this fun video! We think it will inspire you with your animation journey!
- Menu - Report bugs, ideas, and get fast access to the support site. The settings section is in here too.
- Lasso tool - Double press this icon to quickly select the content in your layer.
- Paint bucket tool - We added a new feature that allows you to change the threshold of how much color it will fill.
- Back/Forward animation controls - Tap these buttons to take you beginning or end of your animation.
- We’ve added up to 8 audio tracks.
- And so much more! So go ahead explore the update and let us know what you think by using the hashtag #FlipaClipUpdate. We’re always listening to your feedback!

- Fixed Frames Viewer not scrolling to active frame after opening.

- Fixed Import Video move back or forward frame labels not updated correctly.
- Fixed dark mode Make Movie input hint showing incorrect color.
- Fixed deep links not opening if splash video was shown.
- Fixed Home and Discover buttons changing color when other menus are open.
- Fixed Discover onboarding article click opening multiple times.
- Fixed Frames Viewer dragged frame showing sharp edges.
- Fixed article title showing as tappable.
- Fixed menu drawer showing rounded corners while showing full screen.
